console.log("Current Lottery Number:", await CompanyLotteries.getCurrentLotteryNo());
console.log("Payment Token Address:", await CompanyLotteries.getPaymentToken(1));
console.log("Payment Token Address:", await CompanyLotteries.getPaymentToken());
const CompanyLotteries = await ethers.getContractAt("CompanyLotteries", companyLotteriesAddress);
console.log("Token Total Supply:", (await TestToken.totalSupply()).toString());
console.log("Token Symbol:", await TestToken.symbol());
console.log("Token Name:", await TestToken.name());
const TestToken = await ethers.getContractAt("TestToken", testTokenAddress);
const companyLotteriesAddress = "0x0DCd1Bf9A1b36cE34237eEaFef220932846BCD82";
const testTokenAddress = "0xA51c1fc2f0D1a1b8494Ed1FE312d7C3a78Ed91C0";
const TestToken = await ethers.getContractAt("TestToken", testTokenAddress);
const companyLotteriesAddress = 0x0DCd1Bf9A1b36cE34237eEaFef220932846BCD82;
const testTokenAddress = 0xA51c1fc2f0D1a1b8494Ed1FE312d7C3a78Ed91C0;
console.log("Current Lottery Number:", await CompanyLotteries.getCurrentLotteryNo());
console.log("Payment Token Address:", await CompanyLotteries.getPaymentToken());
const CompanyLotteries = await ethers.getContractAt("CompanyLotteries", companyLotteriesAddress);
// Attach CompanyLotteries
console.log("Token Total Supply:", (await TestToken.totalSupply()).toString());
console.log("Token Symbol:", await TestToken.symbol());
console.log("Token Name:", await TestToken.name());
const TestToken = await ethers.getContractAt("TestToken", testTokenAddress);
// Attach TestToken
const companyLotteriesAddress = "DEPLOYED_COMPANYLOTTERIES_ADDRESS";
const testTokenAddress = "DEPLOYED_TESTTOKEN_ADDRESS";
// Replace these with the deployed addresses from your deployment output
const Lottery = await ethers.getContractFactory("CompanyLotteries");
await lottery.buyTicket({ value: ethers.utils.parseEther("0.1") });
const lottery = await Lottery.attach("DEPLOYED_CONTRACT_ADDRESS");
const Lottery = await ethers.getContractFactory("Lottery");
